entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IResult methods more testable #37502
  • HotReload - Blazor WA - is not working with Radzen components #37498
  • Blazor With WebView2: CSS Hot Reload Does Not Work #37496
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plaintext #37495
  • Design notes: Unifying design and runtime razor builds #37494
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor class library causes a JS error by default #37492
    6.0.0
  • SignalR Cilent Connection state connected and connectionID is Null ? #37488
  • httpclient Content.Headers.ContentDisposition.FileName returns null when the file name has space in it #37486
  • Blazor-server-side Multi routing such as in mvc #37485
  • [Blazor] Concurrency build issues on CI #37483
    6.0.0
  • CS0234 : The type or namespace name '...' does not exist in the namespace '__Blazor....' #37482
    .NET 7 Planning
  • 0x800704e7 errors from AspNetCoreModuleV2 during IIS recycle #37480
  • Blazor - A question related to the 15547 issue #37477
    Discussions
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #37476
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-113594-.NET7 #37473
  • [.Net 6.0] Sampler does not receive the correct ParentId when enabling ActivitySource listener for `Microsoft.AspNetCore` #37471
  • Blazor WASM perf tests are broken in perf lab #37469
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Azure App Services Missing Runtime Microsoft.AspNetCore.App 2.1.26 #36720
  • Startup regression: plaintext #37460
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #37475
  • Register custom event handlers in DOM and handle those in .NET is not working in .NET 6.0 #37012
    6.0.0
  • Errors from browserlink and aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js when logged into React app #37326
    6.0.0
  • Blazor should have something like an angular directive #37437
    Backlog
  • "There is no event handler associated with this event" when removing the element. #37481
  • Blazor: allow to specify an additional handler on a two-way binding #37405
  • Input validation status gets mixed up when toggling content #37391
  • Optimize DefaultRazorProjectEngine.ProcessDesignTime #37259
  • Need to doc react/spa first request auth issue for 6.0 #36676
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Remove Preview attributes #37151
    7.0-preview1
  • TraceId, RequestId, and TraceIdentifier in ASP.NET Core #31747
    Discussions
  • Blazor Hosted - Memory out of bounds #36872
    6.0.0
  • Allow aspnet-browser-refresh.js to be inserted multiple times #35334
    6.0.0
  • deps.json does not exists after update-databse in package manager console #37478
  • Razor corrupts '<% %>' snippets (3.0.100) #37198
    Backlog
  • Startup improvement: caching, multiple_queries #37438
  • Adding user secrets documentation outdated. #37450

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #37500
  • Update build from source doc 33411 #37497
    community-contribution
  • [main] Update SiteExtension #37491
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0] Update SiteExtension #37490
    area-infrastructure
  • [5.0] Update SiteExtension #37489
    area-infrastructure
  • Accessibility fixes in templates #37479
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Support setting ApiParameterRoutInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #37501
  • Add / update PR templates #37412
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
